{"id":381697997,"lang":"java","time":"10 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1597578690,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"720 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/381697997/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"45 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public static List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] arr) {\n        int n = arr.length;\n        List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();\n        HashSet<List<Integer>> seenRes = new HashSet<>();\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            int target = 0 - arr[i];\n            HashSet<Integer> seen = new HashSet<>();\n            for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {\n                if (seen.contains(target - arr[j])) {\n                    List<Integer> rs = new ArrayList<>();\n                    rs.add(arr[i]);\n                    rs.add(target - arr[j]);\n                    rs.add(arr[j]);\n\n                    Collections.sort(rs);\n                    if (!seenRes.contains(rs)) {\n                        seenRes.add(rs);\n                        res.add(rs);\n                    }\n                }\n                seen.add(arr[j]);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
